nodes.text: Venom-mites were venomous arthropods. While on Draboon at the time of the Mandalorian Civil War, Satine Kryze and Obi-Wan Kenobi were attacked by a swarm of venom-mites, resulting in Kenobi having to carry Kryze to safety. If Kenobi suffered something particularly unpleasant during battle, he might remark that it was "like bathing in a lake of venom-mites."
Venom-mites were first mentioned in "Voyage of Temptation," the thirteenth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' second season, which originally aired on February 5, 2010.
